name: mycred-gb-blocks/mycred-users-of-all-ranks
title: Users of all ranks
description: A block to display a list of users for a specific rank.

login.description: Message to display for logged out users.

number.description: The number of users to display. Use -1 for all users of this rank.

show_logo.description: Whether to display the rank logo.

logo_size.description: Size of the rank logo to display.

wrap.description: The HTML element to wrap each row of users. Defaults to div.

nothing.default: No users found with this rank
nothing.description: Message to display when no users are found for the specified rank.

ctype.description: The point type to filter users by.
